item.title: ‘Jake Tapper’s Lead-In Did That’: Editor Takes The Stand To Defend Allegedly Defamatory CNN Report On Navy Vet
item.description: CNN editor Fuzz Hogan took the stand Friday to defend his outlet and their allegedly defamatory report about a U.S. Navy veteran.

item.title: While California Burns, Gavin Newsom Begs Biden To Silence ‘Disinformation’
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom asked Biden to help silence 'mis- and disinformation' as wildfire spread across Los Angeles.

item.title: ‘Disgrace To The System’: Trump Slams Democrat Lawfare As Show Trial Sputters To An End
item.description: When a New York judge sentenced Trump to 'unconditional discharge,' the former president slammed Democrat lawfare.

item.title: Notre Dame’s Riley Leonard Reminds Us Why We Should Place Our Trust In The Lord

item.title: Judge Issues Weird Sentence In Pennsylvania Voter Fraud Case
item.description: The case exposes a flaw in Pennsylvania’s voter integrity rules that allows one person to have more than one vote.
